2:
Sing to Yahweh, bless his name;
\q announce his salvation day after day.
3:
Declare his glory among the nations,
\q his marvelous deeds among all the nations.
\q
4:
For Yahweh is great and is to be praised greatly.
\q He is to be feared above all other gods.
5:
For all the gods of the nations are idols,
\q but it is Yahweh who made the heavens.
\q
6:
Splendor and majesty are in his presence.
\q Strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.
7:
Give praise to Yahweh, you clans of peoples,
\q give praise to Yahweh for his glory and strength.
\q
8:
Give to Yahweh the glory that his name deserves.
\q Bring an offering and come into his courts.
9:
Bow down to Yahweh wearing clothing that honors his holiness.
\q Tremble before him, all the earth.
\q
10:
Say among the nations, "Yahweh reigns."
\q The world also is established; it cannot be shaken.
\q He judges the peoples fairly.
12:
Let the fields rejoice and all that is in them.
\q Then let all the trees in the forest shout for joy
\q
13:
before Yahweh, for he is coming.
\q He is coming to judge the earth.
\q He will judge the world with righteousness
\q and the peoples with his faithfulness.
